title: Soulbreaker Greatsword
content:
Where to Find

Location: Creche Y'llek Dropped by: Kith'rak Therezzyn

Soulbreaker Greatsword Notes & Tips

Disguise Self: Githyanki can be used by a non-gith to leverage the Githborn Psionic Weapon psychic damage.

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin's Shortsword ♦ Assassin's Touch ♦ Balduran's Giantslayer ♦ Battle-Worn Blade ♦ Battle
